text: The Violin Maker of Cremona is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithAlan Goble. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film and stars Herbert Prior, Mary Pickford, and Owen Moore. ==Actors== *Herbert Prior - Taddeo Ferrari *Mary Pickford - Giannina, Taddeo's Daughter *Owen Moore - Sandro *David Miles *Harry Solter - The Judge *Marion Leonard - The Judge's Companion ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Violin Maker of Cremona
